title: Coal Production for Germany
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1870-1911 (2)--Original Data, 1908-1916. Data For 1871 On Include Alsace-Lorraine. Source: Statistisches Jahrbuch Fur Das Deutsche Reich, 1880, P. 30 And Later Annual Issues.

This NBER data series a01217a appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: a01217a
